item.description:
Hey boys,
Saturday night, May 23rd will be a Hartford night out. Starting at Koji at 9, the group will meet up, have a few drinks, meet some people and game out Koji before heading to the main event of the night, the rest of Hartford's best spots.

Please keep in mind that at the end of the month, non-participating memebers will be given notice that they may be deleted from the Connecticut Wingmen. Please make sure to RSVP to ensure this does not happen to you.
item.how_to_find_us: Contact Information will be posted Soon
item.name: Saturday Night - May 23rd - Hartford
